name: Python Tesseract Dev Container
postCreateCommand: sudo bash -c 'echo "Acquire::http::Proxy \"http://127.0.0.1:3142\";" > /etc/apt/apt.conf.d/02proxy && apt-get update && apt-get install -y tesseract-ocr openssh-server && mkdir /var/run/sshd && echo root:test123 | chpasswd && sed -ri s/^#?PermitRootLogin\s+.*/PermitRootLogin yes/ /etc/ssh/sshd_config && service ssh start && pip install -r requirements.txt && rm /etc/apt/apt.conf.d/02proxy'
